job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Who you will work with

   The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer - Gen AI

Who you will work with

   The team you work with on a daily basis consists of a group of data scientists, a small group of software and machine learning professionals, and a program manager who oversees our activities. You will, of course, work closely with the team's data scientist, and together with these colleagues, we work with great enthusiasm and dedication every day to optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality.

   In addition, you are a member of the "Engineering" guild, where about 400 engineers meet each other. Here, you exchange knowledge and experiences with peers. We believe that every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa. This way, you accelerate your career and deliver maximum value with our AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job title explicitly mentions 'Gen AI' and the description highlights working with data scientists and ML professionals to optimize and innovate customer service and processes using AI solutions. While it mentions ML professionals, the emphasis on 'AI solutions' and the context of a team including data scientists and software/ML professionals points towards a role focused on applying generative AI, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile. The mention of an 'Engineering' guild with 400 engineers suggests a broader engineering context where AI solutions are developed and shared, further supporting the application of GenAI.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality' indicates a need to understand and improve business functions.
job_tasks.phrase: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'software and machine learning professionals' and working with 'AI solutions' implies the development and integration of software components related to AI.
The presence of 'data scientists' and 'machine learning professionals' working on 'AI solutions' strongly suggests involvement in model development or application.
The description emphasizes working 'closely with the team's data scientist' and being part of an 'Engineering' guild for knowledge exchange, indicating strong collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: work closely with the team's data scientist

job_tasks.justification: Being part of a guild where engineers 'exchange knowledge and experiences with peers' highlights a collaborative environment.
job_tasks.phrase: exchange knowledge and experiences with peers

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa' and 'accelerate your career' points to a culture of continuous learning and development.
job_tasks.phrase: every engineer can learn something from their peers, and vice versa

job_tasks.justification: The goal to 'optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality' with 'AI solutions' suggests a drive for innovation and taking ownership of these solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: optimize and innovate customer service, processes, and quality
